There are many communities where all are in humble circumstances, where many of the refinements, comforts, and some even of the seeming necessities of life are lacking. But when the truth is received by these people, what a change is wrought!  Tobacco is seen to be a needless expense, as well as an injury to the health. It is discarded, and the means thus saved is used in 


                                    -143- 

paying teachers to instruct the children, that they may be brought up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
